content:
Converter<TInput,TOutput> Delegate

In this Article

Represents a method that converts an object from one type to another type.

Syntax

Declaration

public delegate TOutput Converter<in TInput,out TOutput>(TInput input);

Type Parameters

TInput

The type of object that is to be converted.
TOutput

The type the input object is to be converted to.

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Delegate
  • Converter<TInput,TOutput>

Remarks

This delegate is used by the <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method of the Array class and the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.ConvertAll%2A> method of the List<T>class to convert each element of the collection from one type to another.
